details.arabic_diacless: بارك اللٰه لك في أهلك ومالك، إنما جزاء السلف الحمد والأداء
details.arabic: بَارَكَ اللّٰهُ لَكَ فِيْ أَهْلِكَ وَمَالِكَ، إِنَّمَا جَزَاءُ السَّلَفِ اَلْحَمْدُ وَالْأَدَاءُ
details.transliteration: Baarakallaahu laka fee 'ahlika wa maalika, 'innamaa jazaa'us-salafil-hamdu wal'adaa'.
details.translations: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
details.reference: An-Nasa'i, 'Amalul-Yawm wal-Laylahp. 300, Ibn Majah 2/809. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Majah2/55.

pageTitle: To the debtor when his debt is settled
